    Emerging View Hotels Management Sdn Bhd Vacancies Front Office Assistant

    October 18, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Emerging View Hotels Management Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Front Office Assistant position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • To assist in managing day to day operations and ensuring consistent guest satisfaction.
    • Ability to plan, organize, direct and control all guests services operation and administration.
    • Responsible for the swift handling of guest requests.
    • Monitor Front Office and particularly the personnel to ensure that loyalty card members, known repeat guests and other VIPs receive special attention and recognition.
    • Support and assist Front Office personnel and all departments during peak periods.
    • Supervise the balancing, reconciliation and closing of various shift cash flow and prepare the necessary shift reports to provide accurate, timely information to management while ensuring proper controls are maintained.
    • Ensure all the standard operating procedures (SOP) of the hotel are enforced and followed.
    • Be attentive to hotel security requirement.

    Company Overview

    Set in the enclave of the Khoo Kongsi (a heritage icon of Penang), The Clans Hotel Georgetown is set to revive the art of heritage living with its 54 stylish rooms and suites that combine ultimate comfort and a touch of nostalgic feel.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hotel job in Penang.
    Apply Online
